description: Tree work subject of TPO.Pruning of four trees in front.T85 T86 T89 T91 T85 Ash.T86 Oak  T89 Sycamore T91 Tree of Heaven.Works:  T85 Ash - Thin by 30% and lift over pavement. Reduce  height by one quarter. Deadwood and balance crown.  T86 Oak - Reduce height by up to 8'. Thin by 25%.  Deadwood and balance crown.  T89 Sycamore - Reduce height by up to 10'. Thin by 30%  and balance crown. Lift clear over pavement.  T91 Ailanthus Reduce heiht by 10'. reduce spread clear  of house and adjoining property. Thin by 20%. Balance  crown.
decision_conditions: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
